name: ComfyUI-Majoor-AssetsManager
author: MajoorWaldi
description: Majoor Assets Manager is an advanced asset browser for ComfyUI that provides a comprehensive solution for managing, organizing, and viewing your generated assets. It integrates directly into ComfyUI, offering features like full-text search, metadata extraction, rating and tagging systems, and advanced viewing capabilities.

releases.notes: Use {ref}=tags/vX.Y.Z for a release tag or {ref}=heads/main for the nightly branch (heads/<branch>).
